items.title: Happy Birthday
Cloudflare
items.summary: Cloudflare for those that dont know is a SAAS based service that provides Web Applicaiton Firewall protection and DDOS protection. They are the world leader in protecting sites and they offer a free plan that can be used by creators. In addition to this they…
items.content_html:
Cloudflare for those that dont know is a SAAS based service that provides Web Applicaiton Firewall protection and DDOS protection. They are the world leader in protecting sites and they offer a free plan that can be used by creators. In addition to this they offer a product call Cloudfalre pages which is a static web page storage that is create through GitHub and then deployed through CI/CD

Cloudflare also offers DNS and Domain registration at cost pricing and makes managing domains simples and easy to do.

items.title: Raspberry Pi
items.summary: I have a Raspberry Pi Model 3b and a Model 4. These are the type of computing devices that you can collect for no reason what so ever. However i have now found a use for both and are running in my office performaing their…
items.content_html:
I have a Raspberry Pi Model 3b and a Model 4. These are the type of computing devices that you can collect for no reason what so ever. However i have now found a use for both and are running in my office performaing their various functions. 

The RPi3b does multi duty in that it run a PiHole DNS protection system and also a Web host for small scale web hosting. I have just moved over to NGINX as the Web server as this allows easy Hosting and also straight forward Proxy to a different internal server. 

The reason for this is that the RPi4 hosts a Java Minecraft Server and a controle panel call Pterodactyl. Pterodcactyl, once installed allows quick and easy creation of games servers through the use of Eggs. It is possible to have multiple users assigned to a server and allows that server to be carved up into multiple servers running different worlds. 

Each Server is run under Docker and is all handles by the Pterodactyl software and provices a nice user interface to manage the server and upload Add ons, much like DynMap. 

Phantom - A Minecraft Proxy solution to allow devices like the Xbox, Switch and other devices that dont allow the user to manually add Microsoft servers for them to show up on the LAN screen as if they were hosted on the local LAN.

items.title: Technical Background
items.summary: I work as a Cloud Architect helping application work better in a cloud world. My background is Microsoft so i specialise in Microsoft Azure, but i have experience in AWS, G-Cloud and Oracle Cloud. This blog is not specifically about my work, but is a…
items.content_html:
I work as a Cloud Architect helping application work better in a cloud world. My background is Microsoft so i specialise in Microsoft Azure, but i have experience in AWS, G-Cloud and Oracle Cloud. 

This blog is not specifically about my work, but is a useful place for me to either write about my technical findings, or more than likley how my technical skills intersect with my hobbies.
